gs.log('posting to: ' + query_string);
logClient.get(query_string);</script><state>0</state><sys_created_by/><sys_created_on/><sys_id>1cd433f16f85210015244035eb3ee411</sys_id><sys_mod_count/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_updated_by/><sys_updated_on/><system_id/><trigger_class>DEFAULT</trigger_class><trigger_type>0</trigger_type></sys_trigger></record_update>
